Articles.Content: Just installed a couple mods, everything works but ro, loading is stuck at mk1-2 command pod whenever I try to load the game with mm and ro.
Hi as with all these things please post a the log from your game, it will enable some fault finding rather than guessing
The fix that worked for me when i had similar issues was to delete the MM cache files and the PartDatabase in parent directory.

On 14/03/2016 at 3:37 PM, micr0wave said:

The fix that worked for me when i had similar issues was to delete the MM cache files and the PartDatabase in parent directory.

What does "MM" stand for?
